description: The structure of this file is **[ {\<CardIdIdentifier\>:*Card:Id*, \<CardNameIdentifier\>:*Card:Name*, \<CardSetIdentifier\>:*Card:SetCode*, \<*CardProperties[i]:Name*\>:*Value*, ...}, ... ]**. Information about these fields can be found below. You may choose to not have an AllCards.json, since you may instead define all the card information directly in AllSets.json.
